summary: Completely rebuilt Testimonials section using exact pixel-perfect values from Figma CSS. Extracted all dimensions, spacing, typography, and text content from desktop-figma.css. Implemented three cards with precise specifications: Card 1 (371x243px, padding 35px 29px, stars gap 9px), Card 2 (362x239px, padding 35px 27px, stars gap 10px), Card 3 (371x242px). All text content, star dimensions, name widths, and text heights match Figma exactly.
current_status: Testimonials section completely rebuilt with pixel-perfect accuracy from Figma CSS. All three cards have exact dimensions, spacing, typography, and content. Ready for browser testing.
